name: Against the Godds (bcesarg6, Raffen, edu_ribeiro, narcizo)
name_original: Against the Godds (bcesarg6, Raffen, edu_ribeiro, narcizo)
description:
The Might of Heavenly Randomness Beckons!

Survive against the wrath of Rngesus while battling his subordinates. At your disposal, your trusty trident, the flames of hell and the dices of fate, which must be rolled for you to get uses of your actions!

Beware the holy fury of Rngesus, for He can also cast the dices for divine curses! Controls:

WASD -> Movement

Mouse -> Aiming

Mouse Left -> Attack

Mouse Right -> Ranged spell

Space -> Dodge dash

Tab -> Roll dice

After rolling the dice, select HP or any of your actions. You can also increase your score!

A GMTK Game Jam 2022 Submission Game by:  @brunoDalaRosa @lipeful @duffzera @rafo_farinha
